reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable and versatile, noting it pairs well with leggings and jeans, and can be dressed up or down.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy
items.body: Love it!! It is loose fitting. It covers my backside and is super comfortable. This would make for great attire for fall pictures. Great price, great product!! Oh!! You do have to waer an undershirt but just because its sweater material so you have sweater holes. Read more
items.author: Feefee Mar

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish
items.body: I ordered the fuscia/pink color. Vibrant , pairs well with leggings or jeans. Fabric Quality is good. Too heavy for summer wearing but will feel great in Fall Winter. Runs large, size down. Good length to cover lower mid section . Read more
items.author: RoseofAlabama

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall good!
items.body: There are a lot of things I love about this sweater- the style is great and the color is true to color in the picture. I did take one star off because this is a thinner material than I anticipated and seems like it could very easily snag. However, this did make it a great summer top for a cooler night with leggings. The fit is generous. For reference, I am 5'7", 155lb, carry my weight in hips/lower abdomen, and wear size 8 pants. I ordered the small. I probably could have still gone down a size and would if I were ordering again. It is comfortable and flowy, forgiving of the areas I always want to hide. Read more
items.author: Ddues10

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft!
items.body: LOVE this top. I got it in Mineral Red and color is a perfect warm muted reddish brown. Fabric is super soft and drapes nicely. Feels as comfy as pajamas but looks dressy enough for office. Read more
items.author: Briana

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small frame
items.body: The quality of this material is pretty good but the fit is not impressive . The color is as pictured and great but because of its lack of detail , it looks like I laid a blanket across my body . It may be more suitable for a more curvy woman . Read more
items.author: Tiara Berger

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT FOR LEGGINGS!
items.body: Fits a bit oversized as stated. Iâ€™m 5â€™7 & roughly 165 lbs. Not snug and covers the booty! I ordered a size Medium! Perfect for leggings! Super soft and comfy. Read more
items.author: Megan

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Nice!!!
items.body: Just got it and it fits well. I got a 2X and itâ€™s very loose and boho looking like. I wanted. It does however have a LOT of wrinkles in it that I hope come out or I will send back. I have sprayed it gently with water where the wrinkles are so deep to see if they disappear. Itâ€™s very soft. The color is a perfect green for me. Itâ€™s made well. The price was a bit high in my opinion for this. UPDATE:: I would not buy this again because it pulls too easily. It snagged in my house key the first time wearing and no it looks like poo. Too cheaply made for the price thatâ€™s for sure. Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but not worth $26
items.body: This is a cute blouse, but the fabric is very thin and the quality isnâ€™t great. It has a loose fit, but based on how it feels, I donâ€™t think it will hold up well after a few washes. Read more
items.author: Marissa

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: B Mist Green, B Apricot, B Haze Blue, B Rose, B Brown, B Lightweight Pink, B Medium Grey, B Grey, B Navy Blue, B White, B Black, B Mineral Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
